Artemis:

Artemis ended to picked up her things that she would need: her 
History tapes, her scouting tapes, her diary and seceral things 
more... also he took a small thing that showed a hologram, she turned 
off the Hologram and took it;  Now with her past behind and her 
future in front,  she was ready to left the place where she had lived 
since her spark turn on. She took all things that she needed and 
close the door. 

She walked towards the exit.

This

one

sword
> > just

> > > > rage in
